Home.title: Hi, I'm Ludwing üëã, a Full-Stack Web Developer
Home.subtitle: I specialize in creating innovative web solutions using a variety of technologies. My experience in the field has helped me refine my skills and tackle diverse challenges in web development.
Home.subtitle2: I have worked on developing systems from start to finish. From database planning and design to creating intuitive user interfaces and continuous implementation, I ensure every project stage is successful.
Home.service1Description: I create high-quality websites and mobile applications tailored to your business needs. Whether you need to improve your online presence or develop a new app, I handle both the front-end and back-end.
Home.service2Description: I work to enhance user experience with intuitive and effective designs. I conduct research and design interfaces to ensure users have a smooth and satisfying experience, boosting satisfaction and retention.
Home.service3Description: I provide support at every stage of the project, from requirements analysis and design to development, testing, and implementation. I ensure comprehensive solutions tailored to your specific needs.
Home.subtitle3: Explore my projects, each completed with passion and delivered on time, exceeding expectations.

Aboutme.title: Hi, I'm Ludwing üëã
Aboutme.subtitle: I am a passionate web developer with experience in front-end, back-end, and databases. I have worked on both independent and collaborative projects, gaining skills across the entire software lifecycle. I focus on applying good architectural practices and design patterns to enhance scalability and performance, combining creativity and code to create functional and attractive products.
Aboutme.subtitle2: Throughout my career, I have worked with a wide range of technologies that have enabled me to create complete and efficient solutions at every stage of development:

technologies.programmingLanguagesText: I am familiar with several languages, such as C#, Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
technologies.frontendText: My experience spans Angular, React, Next.js, Astro, Bootstrap, Material UI, and Shadcn, with which I build modern and efficient user interfaces.
technologies.backendText: I have a solid foundation in backend development, with competence in Node.js, Express.js, Laravel, and hands-on experience with PHP.
technologies.databasesText: I work with databases like PostgreSQL and MySQL, allowing me to create robust, data-driven applications.
technologies.mobileDevelopmentText: My skills extend to mobile development, particularly in React Native and practical experience with Ionic.
technologies.toolsText: For my projects, I often use tools like Git, Postman, Visual Studio Code, Adobe Photoshop, Draw.io, Vercel, and Supabase.

Contact.subtitle: Whatever you need
Contact.title: Contact Me
Contact.text: Whether you have a simple question or know exactly what you want

ProjectPage.title: Projects
ProjectPage.description: Discover some of the projects I have been involved in. Each project has a detailed description and a sample image.

project1.title: Native and Web Application for Santa Rosita Pharmacy
project1.name: Santa Rosita Manager
project1.description: Ongoing development of an application to optimize and manage internal pharmacy processes, improving inventory handling, orders, and customer service.

project2.title: Web Application for AstroboyXL Listening Party Event
project2.name: Astroboyxl.shop
project2.description: Web application for the AstroboyXL LISTENING PARTY event, managing ticket sales, user registration, and exclusive product purchases from the Trucho store.

project3.title: Web Mobile Application for CEA
project3.name: App CEA
project3.description: Web mobile app for monitoring and tracking rescued wildlife by CEA of the Autonomous Government of Santa Cruz.

project4.title: Landing Page for My First Professional Portfolio
project4.name: Portfolio
project4.description: Landing Page for my first personal portfolio, where I showcased my projects and skills.
